DOC.detailed_description: Title : Relative bioavailability study formulation : Paroxetine Hydrochloride 25 mg tablet control release ( Paxil CR ) manufacture GlaxoSmithKline Inc. - Mississauga - Canada ( test formulation ) Paroxetine Hydrochloride 25 mg tablet control release ( Paxil CR ) manufacture SmithKline Beecham ( Cork ) Limited - Cidra - Puerto Rico ( reference formulation ) , feed administration healthy volunteer gender . The study prospective , open , randomize , crossover steady state volunteer receive multiple dos drug test reference ( two period drug administration ) . The population compose 60 healthy volunteer , adult gender , age 18 40 year , body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 27 . Volunteers weight 50 kg . 50 % volunteer recruit female 50 % male . DOC.criteria: EXCLUSION CRITERIA : hypersensitivity study drug compound chemically relate ; history serious adverse event ; concurrent recent use antidepressives , schizophrenia , anticonvulsant ; History liver , heart , gastrointestinal renal illness ; ECG finding recommend accord investigator judgement ; The volunteer ingest 5 cup coffee tea day .
